description:
Activates the Entrance Animation (once only), changes 
STR, AGL & PHY Ki Spheres to TEQ Ki Spheres for 1 turn 
from the character's entry turn and Ki +3 for 3 turns from 
the character's entry turn when there are another 2 or more 
"Tournament Participants" Category allies on the team upon 
the character's entry; Ki +3 and ATK & DEF +122%; changes 
STR Ki Spheres to TEQ Ki Spheres; medium chance of changing 
AGL Ki Spheres to TEQ Ki Spheres; medium chance of changing 
PHY Ki Spheres to TEQ Ki Spheres; launches an additional attack 
that has a high chance of becoming a Super Attack if HP is 
66% or more when attacking; launches an additional attack that 
has a great chance of becoming a Super Attack when there is 
another "Universe Survival Saga" Category ally attacking in 
the same turn or a "Universe Survival Saga" Category enemy; 
plus an additional ATK & DEF +122% and reduces damage received 
by 22% when attacking plus an additional Ki +2 with 
2 or more Type Ki Spheres obtained; chance of performing 
a critical hit +22% for every 2 Ki Spheres obtained (up to 66%)

name: A Cheer Filled with Love
Pressure of Ki
description:
Ki +2, ATK & DEF +200% and 
medium chance of stunning all enemies 
at start of turn; attacks effective against all Types 
when facing only 1 enemy at start of turn; 
reduces damage received by 30% when facing 
2 or more enemies at start of turn; plus an additional 
ATK & DEF +50% and a high chance of stunning the 
attacked enemy when performing a Super Attack; 
performs a critical hit when the target enemy is stunned; 
plus an additional ATK & DEF +111% and performs 
a critical hit when there is a "Universe Survival Saga" 
or "Tournament Participants" Category enemy

name: Defenders' Wits

ATK & DEF +400%;
